ROADMAP.md.description: Added Appendix D: Edge Cases, Service Limits, and Mitigation Strategies (lines 16568-17537). Documents 5 major edge cases: (1) Supabase 500MB limit with monitoring scripts, archival strategies, and SQL queries; (2) Cloudflare rate limits including Workers 100K/day, Pages 500 builds/month, 10ms CPU time with caching and optimization strategies; (3) VPS resource constraints with Docker Compose resource limits, PostgreSQL tuning, swap space, connection pooling; (4) Network/connectivity issues with tunnel monitoring and auto-recovery; (5) Backup failures with verification scripts. Includes summary response matrix and preventive measures checklist.
